titles.title: Enhancing the Effective Prosecution of Child Pornography Act of 2008
A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to clarify the scope of the child pornography laws and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 4/16/2008--Introduced. Enhancing the Effective Prosecution of Child Pornography Act of 2008 - Amends the federal criminal code to: (1) include child pornography activities and the production of such pornography for importation into the United States as predicate crimes for money laundering prosecutions; and (2) define "possess" with respect to crimes of child sexual exploitation and child pornography to include accessing by computer visual depictions of child pornography with the intent to view.
